content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw

-- Create external table using SELECT statemanet
IF OBJECT_ID('silver.vendor') IS NOT NULL 
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vendor;
Go
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE nyc_taxi_ldw.silver.vendor
WITH
(
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
    LOCATION = 'silver/vendor',
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
)
AS
SELECT *
FROM bronze.vendor;

SELECT *
FROM silver.vendor;
